At the time, Google CEO Eric Schmidt brushed aside questions about the feds blocking the deal. We are pretty comfortable that because of the unique nature of travel search, that[ the deal] is pro-competitive and pro-consumer, Eric Schmidt said. But the feds have been studying the deal for months now, and in December, Google reportedly used a regulatory provision that gives the feds 30 days to file suit or approve the deal
